channel.title: Mary Mitchell on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Mary Mitchell on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Women in social work education
item.description: VC - Viv Cree MM - Mary Mitchell You’re listening to Iriss.fm, Scotland’s social services podcast. On the 24th of October, Iriss attended ‘Navigating Troubled Waters: Women in Social Work Education in Scotland’ seminar where we heard from Emeritus Professor Viv Cree and Dr Mary Mitchell about a study funded by the Carnegie UK Trust which began with the realisation that women in the Academy fare less well than men across all disciplines.
